definitions.definition: The action of being pushed or drawn beneath another object.
The process of one tectonic plate moving beneath another and sinking into the mantle at a convergent plate boundary .
The act of subducting or taking away.
A surjection between diffeological spaces such that the target is identified as the pushforward of the source.

main_definition: The action of being pushed or drawn beneath another object.
secondary_definitions: ( geology ) The process of one tectonic plate moving beneath another and sinking into the mantle at a convergent plate boundary .
The act of subducting or taking away.
( mathematics , mathematical analysis ) A surjection between diffeological spaces such that the target is identified as the pushforward of the source.
